Header: Army Coordinates Donation of Laptops to Jaffna Students
Content: A simple ceremony to donate 6 laptops to students at Sri Narada Vidyalaya and Ven Madihe Pannaseeha Vidyalaya in Putur got underway separately at both schools in Jaffna on Thursday (5). The 'Dhamma Deepa' Foundation at Sri Narada Buddhist Center - Colombo 07 sponsored the supply of those laptops to these schools for the benefit of children learning there. Both ceremonies, organized by the Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna (SFHQ-J) under the guidelines given by Major General Ruwan Wanigasooriya, Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna were attended by Buddhist monks, members of the donor foundation, 521 and 553 Brigade Commanders, school Principals, teachers, parents and students.
